sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO I_VISIT_RECORD ( SEQ, REG_IP, REG_YEAR, REG_MONTH, REG_DAY, REG_TIME, REG_AGENT, REG_OS ) VALUES( IWORK_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL , #regIp#, #regYear#, #regMonth#, #regDay#, #regTime#, #regAgent#, #regOs# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SEQ, REG_IP, REG_DATE, REG_YEAR, REG_MONTH, REG_DAY, REG_TIME, REG_REFERENCE, REG_AGENT, REG_BROWSER, REG_OS FROM I_VISIT_RECORD WHERE 1=1
REG_YEAR = #regYear#
TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #regDay#
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM I_VISIT_RECORD WHERE 1=1
REG_YEAR = #regYear#
to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT REG_YEAR, COUNT(*) AS REG_COUNT FROM I_VISIT_RECORD WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY REG_YEAR ORDER BY REG_YEAR DESC

SELECT SUM("01") AS JANUARY, SUM("02") AS FEBRUARY, SUM("03") AS MARCH, SUM("04") AS APRIL, SUM("05") AS MAY, SUM("06") AS JUNE, SUM("07") AS JULY, SUM("08") AS AUGUST, SUM("09") AS SEPTEMBER, SUM("10") AS OCTOBER, SUM("11") AS NOVEMBER, SUM("12") AS DECEMBER FROM( SELECT DECODE(REG_MONTH, '1', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "01", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '2', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "02", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '3', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "03", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '4', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "04", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '5', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "05", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '6', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "06", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '7', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "07", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '8', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "08", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '9', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "09", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '10', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "10", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '11', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "11", DECODE(REG_MONTH, '12', REG_COUNT, 0) AS "12" FROM( SELECT REG_MONTH, COUNT(*) AS REG_COUNT FROM I_VISIT_RECORD WHERE UPPER(SITE_ID) = UPPER(#siteId#) AND REG_YEAR = #regYear# GROUP BY REG_MONTH ORDER BY REG_MONTH ) )
